title: The Competitive Edge
brief_description: A study of Victoria’s economic strategy for growth which singles out areas of competitive strength. The nine areas selected for government support include: 1)industrial skills; 2)commercial centre; 3)research capability; 4)brown coal; 5)off shore oil; 6)agriculture; 7)location centrality; 8)national role as cultural and commercial centre; 9)tourism.
